name: Dog Watch
description:
Dog WatchMade for the JamGame game jam, Feburary 2015.Be Good!

These are the words your human leaves you with when they leave. As the dog of the house, you must suppress your instinct to bark at everything that walks by, or else you know that your human will be displeased.

Press and hold each keyboard key as they come up, and try to remain good until your human comes back at the end of the day.
